page.title: 17FASHIONS IN 1985.
page.content: From week to week the fashions change.This summer many things are going to be different from past years.Instead of long baggy t_shirts there will be{bra tops}and bright colours.In the spring of 1985 the craze was{breakdancing}and{bodypopping in{white baseball boots}and rainjackets,such as{Patrick}and Nike.These firms also make trendy training shoes.Pale coloured cotton baggy trousers are very much in fashion together with padded jackets. The ideal trendy girl walking along the street in the year 1985 would be wearing baggy,zippy trousers,a brightly coloured bra top,a white padded jacket and trendy white leather boots.This years{trendy boy would probably wear the same but maybe leaving off the bra top.
